episode_event_general_ch0136_00_platane/:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Sorry to
call you here all of a sudden.

The thing is, I’ve received reports that people have
spotted some strange, unidentified specimens all
over Pasio.
Have you seen anything like that lately?

Apparently, they look like Pokémon in some ways
but absolutely alien in others... In any case,
they’re strange.

It’d be great if we could search the areas near
where they’ve been spotted and maybe even
get a sample of them.

I haven’t seen any,
but I wanna help!

Then why don’t we team up and go on a little
hunt to find these strange specimens?

I wonder what’s going
on here...

Strange specimens have been popping up all
over Pasio...
